text: KTM Adventure S The KTM 990 Adventure is a dual-sport motorcycle produced in Austria by KTM. The bike is powered by the LC8 liquid cooled, four-stroke, DOHC 999 cc 75° V-twin engine, producing around . It is capable of a top speed of around . The engine was evolved from the 950 Adventure. The bore and stroke were increased from to . The engine also featured a revised camshaft and the carburetor was replaced with the electronic fuel injection. Brakes are Brembo two-channel ABS, except the S and the R versions which have no ABS. == References == ==External links== * Category:Dual-sport motorcycles 990 Adventure Category:Motorcycles introduced in 2006
title: KTM 990 Adventure
